author: christopheralanwest
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a backport of PR #28524. 

The GT differences between the 10_6_X GTs and the corresponding 11_0_X GTs consist entirely of tau ID payloads (which are not taken from a GT in 10_6_X) and three obsolete pixel payloads.

**GT diffs with respect to GTs in version of autoCond in master**

**2016 pp collision MC**

https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/110X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v5/106X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v8 

**2016 pp collision MC for "pre-VFP" era (new autoCond key)**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/110X_mcRun2_asymptotic_preVFP_v1/106X_mcRun2_asymptotic_preVFP_v1

**2016 cosmic MC**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/110X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_deco_v4/106X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_deco_v5

**Offline data**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/110X_dataRun2_v9/106X_dataRun2_v25
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/110X_dataRun2_relval_v9/106X_dataRun2_relval_v23

**Prompt-like data**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/110X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HEfail_v9/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HEfail_v13
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/110X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v9/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v14
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/110X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HI_v9/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HI_v14

**2018 cosmic GTs**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/110X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v5/106X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v9
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/110X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_peak_v6/106X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_peak_v9


#### PR validation:

The PR validation is described in the introduction to PR #28524.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This PR is a backport of PR #28524.
title: Global tags for Run 2 UL reprocessing [10_6_X]
